name: vscode-robot-interpreter-webview
description: A RobotFramework interpreter to be used in RobotFramework Language Server.

scriptsComments.Comment1: To develop the library, the recommended way to work with it is changing the launch.json to include an environment variable such as
scriptsComments.Comment2: RF_INTERACTIVE_LOCAL_RESOURCE_ROOT as in the example below, then, running yarn install/yarn watch-build-dev to automatically
scriptsComments.Comment3: regenerate the contents when the webview contents are changed.
scriptsComments.Note: Execute commands with yarn -- i.e.: yarn watch-build-dev

author: Fabio Zadrozny
